source_sentence: 大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉　詔譯貞元新入目錄種種雜呪經一卷(或無經字)　周宇文代天竺三藏闍那崛多譯拾遺編入單重合譯雜呪總二十三首(法華經內呪六首施塔滅罪陀羅尼禮拜滅罪命終諸佛來迎呪一供養三寶呪一觀世音懺悔呪一金剛呪蛇呪一坐禪安穩呪一呪腫呪一鬼病一千轉陀羅尼一觀世音隨心呪四首七俱胝佛神呪一隨一切如來意呪一與呪五首中者同本六字陀羅尼呪一歸依三寶呪一)。

source_sentence: 大唐朝散郎杜行顗奉制譯出大周錄第一譯佛頂勝陀羅尼經一卷　大唐中天竺三藏地婆訶羅譯拾遺編入　第二譯佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷　大唐罽賓沙門佛陀波利譯出大周錄第三譯最勝佛頂陀羅尼淨除業障經一卷　大唐中天竺三藏地婆訶羅於東都再譯拾遺編入第四譯佛頂尊勝陀羅尼經一卷(或加呪字)右五經同本異譯。
translation: The First Translation of the Dhāraṇī of the Foding Honored Triumph One Fascicle The Second Translation of the Dhāraṇī of the Foding Honored Triumph One Fascicle The Third Translation of the Dhāraṇī of the Most Excellent Corrective Action Purifying and Removing Karmic Hindrances One Fascicle The Fourth Translation of the Dhāraṇī of the Foding Honored Triumph One Fascicle (or with the addition of the character 呪) The five scriptures on the right have been translated into the same text.

source_sentence: 佛頂尊勝念誦法一卷(經內題云佛頂尊勝陀羅尼念誦儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄毘沙門天王經一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄無量門微密持經一卷(一名成道降魔得一切智經)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯　第一譯出生無量門持經一卷(或云新微密持經)東晉天竺三藏佛陀跋陀羅譯　第五譯阿難陀目佉尼呵離陀經一卷(或云出無量門持經)宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯　拾遺編入　第六譯無量門破魔陀羅尼經一卷(或云破魔陀羅尼經)宋西域沙門功德直共玄暢譯　第七譯阿難陀目佉尼訶離陀隣尼經一卷元魏天竺三藏佛陀扇多譯　第八譯舍利弗陀羅尼經一卷梁扶南三藏僧伽婆羅譯　第九譯一向出生菩薩經一卷隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯　第九譯出生無邊門陀羅尼經一卷　大唐至相寺沙門釋智嚴譯新編入錄　第十一譯右八經同本異譯(長房等錄中覺賢經數更有新微密持經一卷即是出生無量門經是功德賢經數復有出無量門持經一卷即是阿難陀目佉尼呵離陀經是既是重載故不別存新舊十一譯三譯闕本)。
translation: 佛頂尊勝念誦法一卷(經內題云佛頂尊勝陀羅尼念誦儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄毘沙門天王經一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄無量門微密持經一卷(一名成道降魔得一切智經)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯　第一譯出生無量門持經一卷(或云新微密持經)東晉天竺三藏佛陀跋陀羅譯　第五譯阿難陀目佉尼呵離陀經一卷(或云出無量門持經)宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯　拾遺編入　第六譯無量門破魔陀羅尼經一卷(或云破魔陀羅尼經)宋西域沙門功德直共玄暢譯　第七譯阿難陀目佉尼訶離陀隣尼經一卷元魏天竺三藏佛陀扇多譯　第八譯舍利弗陀羅尼經一卷梁扶南三藏僧伽婆羅譯　第九譯一向出生菩薩經一卷隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯　第九譯出生無邊門陀羅尼經一卷　大唐至相寺沙門釋智嚴譯新編入錄　第十一譯右八經同本異譯(長房等錄中覺賢經數更有新微密持經一卷即是出生無量門經是功德賢經數復有出無量門持經一卷即是阿難陀目佉尼呵離陀經是既是重載故不別存新舊十一譯三譯闕本)。

source_sentence: 出生無邊門經一卷(經內題云出生無邊門陀羅尼經)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄勝幢臂印陀羅尼經一卷大唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄)　第一譯妙臂印幢陀羅尼經一卷大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯　新編入錄第二譯右二經同本異譯(其勝幢臂印經舊錄為單本今新勘為重譯)。

translation: Bodhicaryâvatāra Dhāraṇī Sūtra One Volume (The title of the sūtra is Bodhicaryâvatāra Dhāraṇī Sūtra) Five Fascicle Bodhicaryâvatāra Dhāraṇī Sūtra Translated by the Imperial Court from the Catalogue of New Entries in the Zhenyuan Era by the Tripiṭaka Master Bhikṣuang Zhi Bhikṣang.

source_sentence: 奇特佛頂經三卷(經內題云一字奇特佛頂經威德品)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄金剛頂經一字輪王瑜伽一時處念誦成佛儀軌一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄師子奮迅菩薩所問經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄華聚陀羅尼呪經一卷　失譯今附東晉錄華積陀羅尼神呪經一卷　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯周錄在單本中誤也右三經同本異譯(莫辯先後)。
translation: Three Fascicle Sutra of the Peculiar Buddha-Corona (the title of the sutra is Yizi yizi foding wei te pin) One Fascicle of the Vajra Corona Sutra of the One-Syllable Wheel-Turning King Yoga of the One-Syllable Place of Mindfulness of Becoming a Buddha, Translated by the Emperor Zhenyuan and Newly Entered Catalogue One Fascicle of the Shizi Fenxun Pusa's Questions, Translated by the Emperor Zhenyuan and Newly Entered Catalogue One Fascicle of the Huaji Dhāraṇī Sutra, Lost in Translation, Now Attached to the Dongjin Record One Fascicle of the Huaji Dhāraṇī Sutra, Lost in Translation, Now Attached to the Dongjin Record One Fascicle of the Huaji Dhāraṇī Sutra, Translated by Wu Yuezhi Upāsaka Zhiqian Zhou, Erroneously Recorded in a Single Edition.

translation: Six Syllable Dhāraṇī Sutra One Fascicle Lost in Translation Now Attached to the First Translation of the Dongjin Record Six Syllable Dhāraṇī Sutra One Fascicle (Lost in Translation) Gleanings Compiled into the Second Translation The right two sūtras are the same text and a variant translation.

source_sentence: 吳月支優婆塞支謙譯　拾遺編入　第一譯陀隣尼鉢經一卷(亦云陀隣鉢呪)東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯　拾遺編入第二譯東方最勝燈王如來經一卷　隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯出內典錄第四譯右三經同本異譯(前二本略後經稍廣前四譯二存一闕其最勝燈王經舊錄為單本新勘為重譯)。
translation: The first translation is a one-volume version of the Dhāraṇī Spell (also called the Dhāraṇī Spell), translated by the western ascetic Zhu Tanwulan in the Eastern Jin dynasty. The second translation is a one-volume version of the Tathāgata Sutra of the Eastern Paramount King of Brightness, translated by the Sui Tianzhusangsanzang Gianna Horta and others out of the fourth translation of the Inner Canon.

source_sentence: 善巧方便陀羅尼呪經一卷　失譯　今附東晉錄金剛祕密善門陀羅尼經一卷　失譯　今附東晉錄護命法門神呪經一卷大唐天后代天竺三藏菩提流支譯　出大周錄　第三譯右三經同本異譯(前之二經莫辯先後其護命法門經周錄在單本中誤也)。

translation: The above sixteen sūtras and eighteen volumes were translated into the same volume (also known as the Second Translation of the New Catalog).

source_sentence: 請觀世音菩薩消伏毒害陀羅尼經一卷(亦直云請觀世音經)東晉外國居士竺難提譯　兩譯一闕蘘麌利童女經一卷(經內題加佛說字)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新編入錄除一切疾病陀羅尼經一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄能淨一切眼陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云能淨一切眼疾病陀羅尼經)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入錄雨寶陀羅尼經一卷(經內題加佛說字)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄甘露軍吒利瑜伽念誦法一卷(經內題云甘露軍吒利菩薩供養念誦成就儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄佛說一髻尊陀羅尼經一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄聖閻曼德迦威怒王立成大神驗念誦法一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄速疾立驗摩醯首羅天說迦婁羅阿尾奢法一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄大聖天歡喜雙身毘那夜迦法一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄上十一經十一卷同一帙。
translation: One volume of the Dhāraṇī Sutra of Inviting the Bodhisattva Avalokitêśvara to Eliminate Poison and Harm (also directly called the Sutra of Inviting the Bodhisattva Avalokitêśvara). translation: 西晉三藏竺法護譯(第一譯兩譯一闕)首楞嚴三昧經三卷(亦云首楞嚴經或二卷)姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯(第九譯九譯八闕)觀普賢菩薩行法經一卷(亦出深功德經中亦云普賢觀經)宋罽賓三藏曇摩蜜多譯(第三譯三譯二闕)觀藥王藥上二菩薩經一卷宋西域三藏畺良耶舍譯(第二譯兩譯一闕)不思議菩薩所問經一卷(亦云所說)姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯(第二譯兩譯一闕)上五經十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 十住斷結經十卷(或云十地斷結經或十一卷或十四卷)姚秦涼州沙門竺佛念譯(第二譯一闕)諸佛要集經二卷(亦直云要集經)西晉三藏竺法護譯(第一譯兩譯一闕)未曾有因緣經二卷(亦直云未曾有經)簫齊沙門釋曇景譯(第二譯兩譯一闕)上三經十四卷二帙。
translation: Ten Fascicle Sutra on the Cutting Off of the Knot of the Ten Stages (also called the Sutra on the Cutting Off of the Knot of the Ten Stages or Eleven Fascicle or Fourteen Fascicle Sutra) Translated by Zhu Fonian, a Liangzhou monk of Yao-Qin (the second translation is out of order) Two Fascicle Sutra on the Essentials of the Collection of the Buddhas (also directly called the Essentials of the Collection Sutra) Translated by Zhu Fahou, a Sanzang of Western Jin (the first translation is out of order) Two Fascicle Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of the Unrevealed (also directly called the Unrevealed Sutra) Translated by Śādan Jing, a Xianqi monk (the second translation is out of order) Fourteen Fascicle Sutras of the Three Sutras above are in two books.

source_sentence: 菩薩瓔珞經十二卷(或十四卷或十六卷)　姚秦涼州沙門竺佛念譯第二譯　兩譯一闕超日明三昧經二卷(或無三昧字)西晉清信士聶承遠譯(第二譯兩譯一闕)上二經十四卷二帙。
translation: Pusa yingluo jing 十二卷 (or 14 or 16 volumes) Yaoqin Liangzhou shaman Zhu Fonian 二譯 二譯两譯一譯缺 超日明三昧經二卷 (or without the word samādhi) Xi Jin Qingxinushi Nie Chengyuan譯 (second translation, two translations, one missing) The preceding two sūtras are fourteen volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 賢劫經十三卷(亦名颰陀三昧經或七卷或十卷一帙)西晉三藏竺法護譯(第一譯兩譯一闕)從無垢淨光陀羅尼經下三十六經雖云重譯。
translation: Although the following thirty-six sūtras from the Dhāraṇī of the Pure Immaculate Light were translated again, one survives and the others are all lost.

source_sentence: 但一本存餘皆遺失。
translation: However, one copy exists, and the others were all lost.

source_sentence: 尋求不獲。
translation: Their search was unsuccessful.

source_sentence: 大乘經單譯一百三十一部二百九十三卷二十四帙大法炬陀羅尼經二十卷二帙　隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯大威德陀羅尼經二十卷二帙隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯佛名經十二卷(或十三卷)　元魏天竺三藏菩提流支譯三劫三千佛名經三卷過去莊嚴劫千佛名經上卷。
translation: The single translation of the Mahāyāna sūtras is one hundred and thirty-one, two hundred and ninety-three, twenty-four volumes, and two volumes. The Sui Tianzang Sanzang Jñānagupta et al. translation of the Dhāraṇī of the Greatly Powerful One is twenty volumes and two volumes.

source_sentence: 現在賢劫千佛名經中卷。
translation: The Middle Fascicle of the Sutra of the Names of the Thousand Buddhas of the Present Bhadraka Era.

source_sentence: 未來星宿劫千佛名經下卷失譯。
translation: The second volume of the Sutra of the Names of the Thousand Buddhas of the Future Astral Eon was lost in translation.

source_sentence: 拾遺編入今附梁錄。
translation: It was gleaned and compiled into the present-day Liang Catalogue.

source_sentence: 上二經十五卷二帙。
translation: The above two sūtras are in fifteen volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 其三劫佛名出長房入藏錄中合成一部其中賢劫佛名出賢劫經中。
translation: The names of the buddhas of the three eons are combined in one volume, and the names of the buddhas of the good eon are found in the Good Eon Sutra.

source_sentence: 合為重譯。
translation: They were combined into one translation.

source_sentence: 今以上下佛名是其單本。
translation: The above and below are the names of the buddhas in a single edition.

source_sentence: 以類相從編之於此。
translation: It's compiled here by following the categories.

source_sentence: 五千五百佛名經八卷
translation: Five Thousand Five Hundred Buddhas' Names Sutra, 8 volumes

source_sentence: 隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯
translation: Sui Tianzhu Tripiṭaka, translated by Jñānagupta and others

source_sentence: 不思議功德諸佛所護念經二卷(云出眾經目錄或四卷)曹魏代失譯三藏名拾遺編入上二經十卷同帙(其不思議功德經大周錄云與不思議功德菩薩所問經等同本者誤也)。
translation: The Sutra of the Inconceivable Merits of the Buddhas Protected by the Mind in Two Volumes (a catalogue of scriptures or four volumes) was lost in the Cao Wei dynasty when the Tripiṭaka name was compiled into the ten volumes of the above two scriptures (it is a mistake to say that the Sutra of the Inconceivable Merits is the same as the Sutra of the Inconceivable Merits of the Bodhisattva Questions).

source_sentence: 華手經十三卷(一名攝諸善根經或十一十二一帙)姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯大方等陀羅尼經四卷(一名方等檀特陀羅尼經)北涼沙門法眾於高昌郡譯(出寶唱錄)僧伽吒經四卷元魏優禪尼國王子月婆首那譯力莊嚴三昧經三卷隋天竺三藏那連提耶舍譯大方廣圓覺修多羅了義經一卷大唐罽賓沙門佛陀多羅譯　拾遺編入上四經十二卷同帙。
translation: Thirteen volumes of the Flower Hand Sutra (a scripture on the gathering of wholesome roots or eleven or twelve in one volume) were translated by the Yao-Qin Tri Tripiṭaka Kumārajīva Dhāraṇī in four volumes (a scripture on the donation of all things) by the Northern Liang ascetic Faizhong in Gaochang County (from the Baochang Record) four volumes of the Saṃgataṭa Sutra (from the Yuan Wei Udyāna prince Yue Banshouna translation of the Dhāraṇī of Powerful Adornment in three volumes Sui Tianzang Sanzang Nāriṇyāsana translation of the Daqiuang Yuanjue xiuduoluo liaoyi sūtra in one volume Datang Kebin ascetic Buddhatāra translation of the Gleanings into the twelve volumes of the above four scriptures in the same volume.

source_sentence: 觀佛三昧海經十卷(或八卷一帙或無海字)東晉天竺三藏佛陀跋陀羅譯(右此觀佛三昧經大周錄云宋永初年求那跋陀羅譯出內典錄者謹按內典錄云是東晉覺賢所譯非宋代功德賢周錄誤也又云與後秦羅什所譯單卷觀佛三昧經同本編為重譯今以什公譯者久闕其本卷數全殊不可懸配今依諸舊錄編單本內)大方便佛報恩經七卷失譯在後漢錄菩薩本業經三卷失譯今附東晉拾遺編入上二經十卷同帙(按大周錄中其七卷報恩經云漢代所譯單卷大方便報恩經同本其三卷菩薩本行經云與西晉聶道真所譯單卷菩薩本行經同本今以單卷報恩及本行二經先所闕本卷數全殊不可懸配今依諸舊錄編單本內)。
translation: The ten-fascicle Avalokitêśvara Samādhi Sutra (or eight volumes in one or without the word sea) was translated by the Dongjin Tianzhushan Tripiṭaka Buddhabhadra (right, this Avalokitêśvara Samādhi Sutra was translated by Qunabhadra in the early Song dynasty according to the Dazhou Record, not by the Song dynasty's Gongdeixian Zhou Record, but according to the Dazhou Record, it was translated by Juexian in the Dongjin dynasty, not by the Song dynasty's Gongdeixian Zhou Record, and it was also translated in the same edition as the single-fascicle Avalokitêśvara Samādhi Sutra by Rāsh in the Latter Qin dynasty, which was compiled as a re-translation.

source_sentence: 法集經六卷或七卷
translation: Dharmasaṃgīti-sūtra (Six or Seven Fascicle Sutra)

source_sentence: 元魏天竺三藏菩提流支譯
translation: Yuan Wei Tianzang Tripiṭaka Bodhiruci Translation

source_sentence: 觀察諸法行經四卷
translation: Sutra on the Contemplation of the Practices of the Dharma in Four Volumes

source_sentence: 隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯
translation: Sui Tianzhu Tripiṭaka, translated by Jñānagupta and others

source_sentence: 上二經十卷同帙。
translation: The above two sūtras are in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 菩薩處胎經五卷(亦直云胎經或八卷)姚秦涼州沙門竺佛念譯弘道廣顯三昧經四卷(或無三昧字亦名阿耨達龍王經亦名入金剛門定意經凡十二品)西晉三藏竺法護譯右一經仁壽大周等錄皆云與阿耨達龍王經同本異譯二經俱云竺法護出編為重譯(按僧祐錄。
translation: The Sutra of the Bodhisattva's Handling of the Womb (also directly called the Womb Sutra or eight volumes) was translated by the Liangzhou ascetic Zhu Fonian into four volumes of the Guangdao guangxian sanmei jing (or without the word sanmei, also called the Anavatapta-nāgao jing, and also called the Jingangmen jing yezhang), and the Western Jin tripiṭaka Zhu Fahou translated the right one into the same text as the Anavatapta-nāgao jing, as stated in the records of Renshou and Dazhou, and the two sūtras were both compiled and re-translated by Zhu Fahou.

source_sentence: 竺法護所出但有阿耨達經二卷。
translation: Zhu Fahou produced only two volumes of the Anavatapta Sutra.

source_sentence: 下注云一名弘道廣顯三昧經。
translation: The following commentary says that it is a scripture that shows the broadness of the way.

source_sentence: 長房錄中竺法護所譯有弘道廣顯三昧經二卷。
translation: In the Changfang lu, there is a translation by Zhu Fahou of the Hongdao guangxian sanmei jing in two volumes.

source_sentence: 下注云亦名阿耨達請佛經。
translation: The following note says it's also called the Anavatapta Invitation to the Buddha Sutra.

source_sentence: 唐內典錄護公所譯雙載二經。
translation: In the Tang Canon of Records, there are two sūtras translated by Duke Hoo.

source_sentence: 又長房內典二錄。
translation: It's also recorded in the Changfang Collection of Internal Texts.

source_sentence: 西晉失譯復有阿耨達龍王經一卷。
translation: In the Western Jin Dynasty, there was a lost translation and another one, Anavatapta-nāga-rāja-sūtra, in one volume.

source_sentence: 今對勘二經。
translation: We now compare the two sūtras.

source_sentence: 文並無異。
translation: There's no difference between their texts.

source_sentence: 但以立名多種。
translation: However, it's because of the variety of names established.

source_sentence: 致使群錄差殊。
translation: As a result, there are differences between the various records.

source_sentence: 或有雙載二經。
translation: Some contain both sūtras.

source_sentence: 或有互顯名目。
translation: Some show the names of each other.

source_sentence: 時無悟者。
translation: There were no awakened ones at the time.

source_sentence: 流濫日深。
translation: Their circulation became increasingly deep.

source_sentence: 今一廢一存。
translation: Now, we'll repeal one and keep the other.

source_sentence: 庶無謬失。
translation: Perhaps there's no mistake.

source_sentence: 但留一本。
translation: We'll just keep one copy.

source_sentence: 編入單本)。
translation: (It's compiled into a single edition.)

source_sentence: 施燈功德經一卷一名然燈經
translation: Sutra on the Merit of Giving Lanterns (1 vol.) A Sutra of Rantaeng

source_sentence: 高齊天竺三藏那連提耶舍譯
translation: A Translation of the Sanskrit Tripiṭaka of Nālandī Yeshiva by Gaoqi Tianzang

source_sentence: 上三經十卷同帙。
translation: The above three sūtras are in ten volumes each.

source_sentence: 大佛頂如來密因修證了義諸菩薩萬行首楞嚴經十卷(一帙)大唐中天竺三藏般剌蜜帝於廣州譯　新編入錄大毘盧遮那成佛神變加持經七卷大唐中天竺三藏輸波迦羅共沙門一行譯新編入錄金剛頂經瑜伽修習毘盧遮那三麼地法一卷南天竺三藏沙門金剛智譯　貞元新入目錄大毘盧遮那成佛神變加持經略示七支念誦隨行法一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄大日經略攝念誦隨行法一卷(亦名五支略念誦要行法)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄不空羂索毘盧遮那佛大灌頂光真言一卷(出不空羂索經二十八)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄上五經十一卷同帙。

source_sentence: 七佛所說神呪經四卷(或無所說字)晉代譯失三藏名今附東晉錄(右七佛神呪經大周錄中編為重譯云與吳代外國優婆塞支謙所譯單本七佛神呪經同本今以單卷經文闕其本卷數復殊不可懸配今依舊錄編單本內)大吉義神呪經二卷或四卷元魏昭玄統沙門釋曇曜譯　出法上錄文殊師利寶藏陀羅尼經一卷　大唐南天竺三藏菩提流志譯新編入錄金剛光焰止風雨陀羅尼經一卷　大唐南天竺三藏菩提流志譯新編入錄阿吒婆拘鬼神大將上佛陀羅尼經一卷失譯拾遺編入　今附晉錄阿彌陀鼓音聲王陀羅尼經一卷失譯拾遺編入　今附梁錄大普賢陀羅尼經一卷失譯拾遺編入　今附梁錄大七寶陀羅尼經一卷失譯拾遺編入　今附梁錄六字大陀羅尼經一卷失譯拾遺編入　今附梁錄安宅神呪經一卷　後漢失譯摩尼羅亶經一卷東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯　拾遺編入玄師颰陀所說神呪經一卷(錄云幻師無所說字)東晉西域沙門竺曇無蘭譯　拾遺編入護諸童子陀羅尼呪經一卷　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯諸佛心陀羅尼經一卷　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄拔濟苦難陀羅尼經一卷　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄八名普密陀羅尼經一卷　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄持世陀羅尼經一卷　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄六門陀羅尼經一卷　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄清淨觀世音普賢陀羅尼經一卷大唐總持寺沙門釋智通譯　出大周錄上十九經二十三卷同帙。
translation: The sūtras of the seven buddhas are of the same origin as the single translation of the sūtras of the seven buddhas by Upāsaka Zhiqian in the Wu dynasty, but since the text of the single volume is missing, the number of volumes in the sūtras is even greater than the number of volumes in the old record.

source_sentence: 觀自在菩薩最勝明王心經二卷(經內題云金剛恐怖集會方廣儀軌觀自在菩薩三世最勝心王經序品第一)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄聖觀自在菩薩心真言觀行儀軌一卷(經內題云瑜伽觀行儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄觀自在大悲成就瑜伽蓮華部念誦法門一卷(經內亦名成就大悲觀自在)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄葉衣觀自在菩薩陀羅尼經一卷(經內略無陀羅尼字)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄瑜伽蓮華部念誦法一卷大興善寺沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯　貞元新入目錄金剛頂蓮華部心念誦法一卷(經內題云念誦儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄不動使者陀羅尼祕密法一卷南天竺國三藏沙門金剛智譯　貞元新入目錄底哩三昧耶經一卷(經內題云底哩三昧耶不動使者念誦法)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄智炬陀羅尼經一卷大唐天后代于闐三藏提雲般若譯　出大周錄諸佛集會陀羅尼經一卷大唐天后代于闐三藏提雲般若譯　出大周錄隨求即得大自在陀羅尼神呪經一卷大唐天后代北天竺三藏寶思惟譯　出大周錄普遍光明大隨求陀羅尼經二卷(經內題云普遍光明清淨熾盛如意寶印心無能勝大明王大隨求陀羅尼經)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄百千印陀羅尼經一卷大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯　新編入錄上十四經十五卷同帙。
translation: 觀自在菩薩最勝明王心經二卷(經內題云金剛恐怖集會方廣儀軌觀自在菩薩三世最勝心王經序品第一)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄聖觀自在菩薩心真言觀行儀軌一卷(經內題云瑜伽觀行儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄觀自在大悲成就瑜伽蓮華部念誦法門一卷(經內亦名成就大悲觀自在)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄葉衣觀自在菩薩陀羅尼經一卷(經內略無陀羅尼字)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄瑜伽蓮華部念誦法一卷大興善寺沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯　貞元新入目錄金剛頂蓮華部心念誦法一卷(經內題云念誦儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄不動使者陀羅尼祕密法一卷南天竺國三藏沙門金剛智譯　貞元新入目錄底哩三昧耶經一卷(經內題云底哩三昧耶不動使者念誦法)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄智炬陀羅尼經一卷大唐天后代于闐三藏提雲般若譯　出大周錄諸佛集會陀羅尼經一卷大唐天后代于闐三藏提雲般若譯　出大周錄隨求即得大自在陀羅尼神呪經一卷大唐天后代北天竺三藏寶思惟譯　出大周錄普遍光明大隨求陀羅尼經二卷(經內題云普遍光明清淨熾盛如意寶印心無能勝大明王大隨求陀羅尼經)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄百千印陀羅尼經一卷大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯　新編入錄上十四經十五卷同帙。

source_sentence: 救面燃餓鬼陀羅尼神呪經一卷(亦云施餓鬼呪經後兼有施水呪)大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯　新編入錄施焰口餓鬼陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云佛說救拔燄口餓鬼陀羅尼經)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄莊嚴王陀羅尼呪經一卷　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄香王菩薩陀羅尼呪經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄一切功德莊嚴王經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄拔除罪障呪王經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄善夜經一卷　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄虛空藏菩薩能滿諸願最勝心陀羅尼求聞持法一卷出成就一切義品　大唐中天竺三藏輸波迦羅譯新編入錄金剛頂經曼殊室利菩薩五字心陀羅尼品一卷　大唐南天竺三藏金剛智譯新編入錄金剛王菩薩念誦法一卷(經內云祕密念誦儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄觀自在如意輪菩薩瑜伽法要一卷大唐南天竺三藏金剛智譯(新編入錄)(右虛空藏等三經及前四卷瑜伽並出金剛頂經彼經梵本有十萬頌此之四經略要抄譯非全部也)。
translation: 救面燃餓鬼陀羅尼神呪經一卷(亦云施餓鬼呪經後兼有施水呪)大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯　新編入錄施焰口餓鬼陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云佛說救拔燄口餓鬼陀羅尼經)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄莊嚴王陀羅尼呪經一卷　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄香王菩薩陀羅尼呪經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄一切功德莊嚴王經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄拔除罪障呪王經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄善夜經一卷　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄虛空藏菩薩能滿諸願最勝心陀羅尼求聞持法一卷出成就一切義品　大唐中天竺三藏輸波迦羅譯新編入錄金剛頂經曼殊室利菩薩五字心陀羅尼品一卷　大唐南天竺三藏金剛智譯新編入錄金剛王菩薩念誦法一卷(經內云祕密念誦儀軌)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄觀自在如意輪菩薩瑜伽法要一卷大唐南天竺三藏金剛智譯(新編入錄)(右虛空藏等三經及前四卷瑜伽並出金剛頂經彼經梵本有十萬頌此之四經略要抄譯非全部也)。

source_sentence: 觀自在菩薩如意輪瑜伽一卷
translation: One volume of the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva's Wish-Fulfilling Wheel Yoga

source_sentence: 大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄如意輪念誦法一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄佛地經一卷大唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄有論七卷釋)佛垂般涅槃略說教誡經一卷(亦云佛臨般一名遺教經)姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯有釋論一卷(右此遺教經舊錄所載多在小乘律中或編小乘經內今以真諦法師譯遺教論彼中解釋多約大乘小乘不顯故移編此)出生菩提心經一卷隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯佛印三昧經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯　拾遺編入文殊師利般涅槃經一卷西晉居士聶道真譯　拾遺編入異出菩薩本起經一卷或無起字　西晉居士聶道真譯拾遺編入千佛因緣經一卷姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯　出法上錄賢首經一卷(一名賢首夫人經)乞伏秦沙門釋聖堅譯月明菩薩經一卷(或云月明童子或云月明童男)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯(右此月明菩薩經大周錄中編為重譯云與月光童子經等同本者誤也文意全異故為單譯)心明經一卷(一名心明女梵志婦飯汁施經)西晉三藏竺法護譯滅十方冥經一卷(或云十滅冥經)西晉三藏竺法護譯鹿母經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯(右群錄中更有鹿子經一卷云是吳代外國優婆塞支謙所譯即與前鹿母經文句全同但立名殊故不雙出)。
translation: 大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄如意輪念誦法一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄佛地經一卷大唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄有論七卷釋)佛垂般涅槃略說教誡經一卷(亦云佛臨般一名遺教經)姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯有釋論一卷(右此遺教經舊錄所載多在小乘律中或編小乘經內今以真諦法師譯遺教論彼中解釋多約大乘小乘不顯故移編此)出生菩提心經一卷隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯佛印三昧經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯　拾遺編入文殊師利般涅槃經一卷西晉居士聶道真譯　拾遺編入異出菩薩本起經一卷或無起字　西晉居士聶道真譯拾遺編入千佛因緣經一卷姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯　出法上錄賢首經一卷(一名賢首夫人經)乞伏秦沙門釋聖堅譯月明菩薩經一卷(或云月明童子或云月明童男)吳月支優婆塞支謙譯(右此月明菩薩經大周錄中編為重譯云與月光童子經等同本者誤也文意全異故為單譯)心明經一卷(一名心明女梵志婦飯汁施經)西晉三藏竺法護譯滅十方冥經一卷(或云十滅冥經)西晉三藏竺法護譯鹿母經一卷西晉三藏竺法護譯(右群錄中更有鹿子經一卷云是吳代外國優婆塞支謙所譯即與前鹿母經文句全同但立名殊故不雙出)。

translation: Māra's Reversal Sutra 1 vol.

translation: Translated by Dharmarakṣa of the Western Jin Dynasty

source_sentence: 上二十六經二十六卷同帙。
translation: The above twenty-six sūtras and twenty-six volumes are in the same book.

source_sentence: 德光太子經一卷(一名賴吒和羅所問光德太子經)西晉三藏竺法護譯(右光德太子經大周錄中編為重譯云與須賴經等同本異譯者誤也文意既異故入單本)。
translation: Prince Derguang's Sutra One Fascicle (A Sutra of Prince Derguang's Questions Asked by Raizhao) Translated by the Western Jin Tripiṭaka, Zhu Fahou (Right: Prince Derguang's Sutra Compiled in the Dazhou Record as a Re-translation, Yun and the Sutra of Surai are the same in meaning, so the translator was mistaken in including them in a single text).

translation: Song Dynasty Tripiṭaka Translated by *Guṇabhadra

translation: Sutra of the Firmess in One Volume (A Sutra of the Firmess)

translation: Translated by the Sui Tianzang Tripiṭaka Nālandīyaśas

source_sentence: 商主天子所問經一卷(或無所問字)隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯諸法最上王經一卷隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯師子莊嚴王菩薩請問經一卷(一名八曼荼羅經)大唐天竺三藏那提譯(出大周錄)佛為優填王說王法政論經一卷　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄離垢慧菩薩所問禮佛法經一卷大唐天竺三藏那提譯　出大周錄　拾遺編入受持七佛名號所生功德經一卷　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄佛臨涅槃記法住經一卷(或加般字)大唐三藏玄奘譯　出翻經圖寂照神變三摩地經一卷大唐三藏玄奘譯　出翻經圖差摩婆帝受記經一卷元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯不增不減經一卷或云二卷者誤　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯造塔功德經一卷　大唐中天竺三藏地婆訶羅譯出大周錄　拾遺編入右繞佛塔功德經一卷亦云遶塔功德　大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯新編入錄大乘四法經一卷　大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯新編入錄有德女所問大乘經一卷(第三譯與梵女守意經同本新勘出)　大唐天后代天竺三藏菩提流支譯出大周錄大乘流轉諸有經一卷　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄妙色王因緣一卷　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄佛為海龍王說法印經一卷　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄師子素馱娑王斷害經一卷　大唐至相寺沙門釋智嚴譯新編入錄般泥洹後灌臘經一卷(一名四輩灌臘經亦直云灌臘經)西晉三藏竺法護譯(右此灌臘經大周錄等皆為重譯云與盂蘭盆經等同本異譯者誤也今尋文異故為單本)。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of the Questions of the Sovereign of Commerce (or without the word "questions") Sui Tianzang Sanzang Jialanghuodo et al.

source_sentence: 八部佛名經一卷亦云入佛經
translation: Sutra of the Names of the Eight Buddhas (1 volume), also called the Sutra of Entering Buddhahood

source_sentence: 元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯
translation: Yuan Wei Bhramun Gautama Prajñāruci Translation

source_sentence: 上二十二經二十三卷同帙。
translation: The above twenty-two sūtras and twenty-three volumes are in the same book.

source_sentence: (其八部佛名經大周錄云與八吉祥呪經等同本異譯者誤也八數雖同說處全異所為復別故為單本)。
translation: (The eight part Sutra of the Buddha's Names, as recorded in the Dazhou Record, is the same as the eight auspicious Dhāraṇīs, but this is a mistake.)

source_sentence: 菩薩內習六波羅蜜經一卷(或云六波羅蜜經安公云出方等部)後漢臨淮沙門嚴佛調譯　拾遺編入大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經十卷罽賓國三藏賜紫沙門般若奉詔譯大花嚴長者問佛那羅延力經一卷罽賓國三藏賜紫沙門般若譯　貞元新入目錄上三經十二卷同帙。
translation: The Sutra of the Six Perfections for Inner Study of the Bodhisattva in One Volume (or the Sutra of the Six Perfections, which Angong said was from the Vaipulya school) was translated by Yan Fotiao, a monk at Linghuai in the later Han Dynasty. The ten volumes of the Sutra of the Six Perfections for the Purposes of Mahāyāna were compiled by the Tripiṭaka of Kāśyapa and translated by imperial order into twelve volumes by Prajñāpāramitā, a purple monk at the end of the Tripiṭaka of Kāśyapa.

source_sentence: 大乘本生心地觀經八卷
translation: Eight Fascicle Sutra of Contemplation on the Mind Ground in the Buddha's Life

source_sentence: 大唐罽賓三藏般若譯
translation: Translation of the Tripiṭaka Prajñā of Kāśmīra, Great Tang

source_sentence: 洛京魏府已來並入貞元目內此經一帙菩薩投身餓虎起塔因緣經一卷(僧祐錄云以身施餓虎經)北涼高昌沙門釋法盛譯　出經後記金剛三昧本性清淨不壞不滅經一卷(亦名金剛清淨經)新為失譯　附三秦錄師子月佛本性經一卷(新為失譯附三秦錄)(右金剛清淨經群錄並云吳代外國優婆塞支謙譯後漢失譯復有其名師子月佛經群錄並云西晉三藏竺法護譯今詳二經文句並非謙護所翻似是秦梁已來什公等譯)。
translation: One volume of this sutra was incorporated into the Zhenyuan catalogue since the Wei administration in Lujing. One volume of this sutra was translated by the Bodhisattva who threw himself into the pagoda of the hungry tiger and raised the cause and conditions of the pagoda.

source_sentence: 長者法志妻經一卷　失譯(安公涼土異經錄中有名今亦附涼錄)薩羅國經一卷(或云薩羅國王經)失譯今附東晉錄(右二經法上錄中並云姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯今詳二經文句並非什公所翻似是晉魏代其法志妻經安公梁土異經錄中先有名今亦附涼錄薩羅國經附於晉錄)。
translation: One volume of the Sutra of Dharmakīrti, the elder, was lost (it was named in the Liang Translation of the Sutra of An Gong, and is now attached to the Liang Translation), and one volume of the Sutra of Sala State was lost (it was also named in the Liang Translation of the Sutra of King Sala), and is now attached to the Dongjin Translation (the right two sūtras were translated by the Yao-Qin Tripiṭaka Kumārajīva, but the detailed text of the two sūtras was not translated by Shigong, and seems to have been translated by the Jin and Wei Dynasties, whose Sutra of Dharmakīrti was first named in the Liang Translation of the Sutra of An Gong, and is now attached to the Liang Translation of the Sutra of Sala State, and is now attached to the Jin Translation).

source_sentence: 十吉祥經一卷　失譯　今附秦錄
translation: Shichijixiang jing (十吉祥經) 1 volume, lost in translation, now appended to the Qin records.

source_sentence: 吉祥天女十二名號經
translation: Sutra on the Twelve Names of the Auspicious Goddess

source_sentence: 大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄大吉祥天女經一卷(經內題云佛說大吉祥天女十二契一百八名無垢大乘經)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄長者女菴提遮師子義經一卷失譯　今附梁錄　拾遺編入一切智光明仙人慈心因緣不食肉經一卷失譯　今附秦錄金剛三昧經二卷(或一卷)　北涼失譯　拾遺編入法滅盡經一卷　僧祐錄中失譯　今附宋錄甚深大迴向經一卷僧祐錄中失譯　今附宋錄天王太子辟羅經一卷(或無天王字亦云辟羅)僧祐錄云安公關中異譯　拾遺編入　今附秦錄優婆夷淨行法門經二卷(亦直云淨行經或無經字)僧祐錄云安公涼土異經　今附涼錄八大人覺經一卷後漢安息三藏安世高譯　出寶唱錄三品弟子經一卷亦云弟子學有三輩經　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯四輩經一卷或云四輩弟子經。
translation: Daxingshansi sanzang shaman da guangzhi bukong was instructed to translate one volume of the Zhenyuan xinjin catalog of the Sutra of the Great Auspicious Goddess (the title of the sutra is "The Twelve Mudras and One Hundred and Eight Names of the Great Auspicious Goddess, the Immaculate Mahāyāna Sutra") into the Zhenyuan xinjin catalog of the Sutra of the Elder Goddess Aandizhe Shizi, one volume of which was lost in translation.

source_sentence: 亦云四輩學經　西晉三藏竺法護譯出法上錄當來變經一卷或云當來變識經　西晉三藏竺法護譯過去佛分衛經一卷或云過世　西晉三藏竺法護譯十二頭陀經一卷一名沙門頭陀經　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯樹提伽經一卷　宋天竺三藏求那跋陀羅譯長壽王經一卷僧祐錄云安公失譯今附西晉錄(右此長壽王經等云出阿含經謹撿四阿含內並無此經雖增一第十六中有長壽王緣起文意全異乃此大乘故編於此)。
translation: It is also called the Sutra of the Four Categories of Discipleship. The Xi Jin Tripiṭaka Zhu Faju translated the Exodus Sutra of the Future Transformation in one volume or the Sutra of the Future Transformation of Consciousness.

source_sentence: 法常住經一卷
translation: Sutra on the Permanent Abiding of the Dharma (1 volume)

source_sentence: 僧祐錄云安公失譯經今附西晉錄
translation: Saṃyuktâgama Record, Record of the Lost Translation of the Ankō Sutra, Now Attached to the Western Jin Dynasty Record

source_sentence: 上二十四經二十六卷同帙(今撿尋文理多涉大乘編在小乘至理故編移於此)。
translation: The above twenty-four scriptures and twenty-six volumes were compiled in the same volume (the present Qiansheng wenyi mostly relates to the great vehicle and is compiled here because it's the ultimate principle of the lesser vehicle).

source_sentence: 菩薩調伏藏二十七部五十五卷五帙
translation: The Bodhisattva Vinaya is a collection of twenty-seven texts in fifty-five volumes and five books.

translation: "The precepts are a general term for protection against danger.

source_sentence: 防患之總名也。
translation: It's a general term for preventing danger.

source_sentence: 菩薩淨戒唯禁於心。
translation: The bodhisattva's pure precepts are limited to the mind.

source_sentence: 聲聞律儀則防身語故有託緣興過聚徒訶結。
translation: The śrāvaka precepts guard against physical actions and speech, so there are dependencies that give rise to the fetters of transgressions and abuses.

source_sentence: 菩薩大人都無此事。
translation: None of the bodhisattvas' masters has this condition.

source_sentence: 佛直為說令使遵行。
translation: The Buddha simply explains it for them and causes them to follow it.

source_sentence: 既無犯制之由。
translation: Since there's no reason to violate the restraints, the matter of the rejection of fetters is missing.

source_sentence: 故闕訶結之事。
translation: Therefore, the matter of the rejection of the bonds is absent.

source_sentence: 諸大乘經明學處者。
translation: The great vehicle scriptures explain the place of training.

source_sentence: 摭之於此為菩薩調伏藏云。
translation: It's gathered here as the Bodhisattva Vinaya.

source_sentence: 菩薩地持經十卷(或名地持論或八卷一帙)北涼天竺三藏曇無懺於姑臧譯(右一經初有歸敬頌出瑜伽論本地分中菩薩地。
translation: The Bodhisattvabhūmi-sūtra is a ten-volume work (also called Dichijilun or an eight-volume work) translated in Guzang by the Tripiṭaka of Northern Liang and India's Dharmagupta Dharmagupta.

source_sentence: 昔高齊昭玄統沙門法上答高句麗沙門云。
translation: In the past, the Zhaoxuan-tong monk Fashang of Gaoqi replied to a Goguryeo monk.

source_sentence: 地持是阿僧佉比丘從彌勒受得。
translation: "The ground holder is the monk Asaṅgaha, who received it from Maitreya.

source_sentence: 阿僧佉者即無著菩薩是也。
translation: "Asaṅgha is the bodhisattva Wuzhu.

source_sentence: 又按梁沙門僧祐地持記云。
translation: Also, according to the Liang ascetic Sengyou's Notes on the Di chi, it says.

source_sentence: 菩薩地持經八卷有二十七品分為三段。
translation: "The eight-fascicle Bodhisattvabhūmi-sūtra has twenty-seven chapters divided into three sections.

source_sentence: 第一段十八品。
translation: The first section contains eighteen chapters.

source_sentence: 第二段四品。
translation: The second section has four chapters.

source_sentence: 第三段五品。
translation: The third section contains five chapters.

source_sentence: 文不出有異名而今此本或題云菩薩地經。
translation: The text doesn't have different names, and this version may be titled the Sutra of the Bodhisattva Stages.

source_sentence: 今撿尋經末亦有多名。
translation: Now, when we examine the end of the sutra, there are also multiple names.

source_sentence: 文又云名為菩薩地。
translation: The text also says that it's called the bodhisattva ground. It's called the bodhisattva collection of mahādras.

source_sentence: 名為菩薩藏摩得勒。
translation: "It's called the bodhisattva store, Mathilde. It's called Mahāyāna gathering.

source_sentence: 名摩訶衍攝。
translation: It's called the Mahāyāna collection.

source_sentence: 名不壞顯示。
translation: It's called indestructible manifestation.

source_sentence: 名無障礙清淨智根本。
translation: It's called the root of unobstructed pure cognition.

source_sentence: 祐云不出異名者不然。
translation: You say it doesn't come out by another name, but it doesn't.

source_sentence: 又撿群錄。
translation: It's also called the Qunlu.

source_sentence: 曇無懺所譯別存菩薩戒經。
translation: (The Dharmakṣema translation is a variant of the Cūḷapanthaka Sutra of the Bodhisattva Precepts.

source_sentence: 或云菩薩地經者誤也)。
translation: (Some say the Sutra of the Bodhisattva Ground is incorrect.)

source_sentence: 菩薩善戒經九卷(一名菩薩地或十卷)宋罽賓三藏求那跋摩等譯(右一經群錄皆云與地持經同本異譯。
translation: The Sutra of the Good Morality of the Bodhisattva in Nine Fascicles (a Bodhisattva Ground or Ten Fascicles) was translated by the Song Dynasty Tripiṭaka of Kāśyapa and others (to the right of this sutra, all the group records say that it's the same text as the Earth-holding Sutra and that it's a different translation.

source_sentence: 今詳文理非不差殊。
translation: Now, when we look at the text and principle, there's no difference.

source_sentence: 其善戒經前有序品。
translation: The first part of the Sutra on Good Morality is in order.

source_sentence: 後有奉行。
translation: It's followed by the practice of consecration.

source_sentence: 地持經並無。
translation: The Earth-holding Sutra has none.

source_sentence: 其地持戒品中有受菩薩戒文及菩薩戒本。
translation: In the Chapter on Ground-holding Precepts, there's a text for accepting the bodhisattva precepts and a copy of the bodhisattva precepts.

source_sentence: 善戒經即無。
translation: The Sutra of Good Morality has neither.

source_sentence: 自餘之外。
translation: Except for the others, the text and meaning are the same.

source_sentence: 文意大同。
translation: The text and meaning are the same.

source_sentence: 地持復出瑜伽。
translation: "The precepts of Dichiji are also part of the yoga.

source_sentence: 諸錄或編入論。
translation: The records may be compiled into a treatise.

source_sentence: 既有差殊。
translation: Since there are differences, I don't dare to say for sure.

source_sentence: 未敢為定。
translation: I dare not define them as such.

source_sentence: 又按梁沙門僧祐菩薩善戒經記云。
translation: Also, according to the Liang Commentary on the Sutra of the Good Morality of the Bodhisattva Saṃgha, it says.

source_sentence: 此名善戒。
translation: "These are called the good precepts.

source_sentence: 名菩薩地。
translation: It's called the bodhisattva ground.

source_sentence: 名菩薩毘尼摩夷。
translation: It's called the bodhisattva vinaya.

source_sentence: 名如來藏。
translation: It's called the tathāgatagarbha.

source_sentence: 名一切善法根本。
translation: It's called the root of all good qualities.

source_sentence: 名安樂國。
translation: It's called the Land of Peace and Bliss.

source_sentence: 名諸波羅蜜聚。
translation: It's called the prātimokṣa.

source_sentence: 凡有七名。
translation: There are seven names for them.

source_sentence: 第一卷先出優波離問受戒法。
translation: The first fascicle begins with Upāli's question about the rules for receiving the precepts.

source_sentence: 第二卷始方有題如是我聞。
translation: In the second volume, there's the title Thus Have I Heard.

source_sentence: 次第列品乃有三十。
translation: There are then thirty categories listed in order.

source_sentence: 復有別本題為菩薩地經。
translation: There's also a separate text titled the Bodhisattva Ground Sutra.

source_sentence: 今按尋經本與祐記不同。
translation: Now, according to the investigation of the sūtra, the title differs from that of the Upāli sūtra.

source_sentence: 經初即有如是我聞。
translation: At the beginning of the sutra, there's Thus Have I Heard.

source_sentence: 而無優波離問受戒法。
translation: There's no Upāli questioning the rules for receiving the precepts.

source_sentence: 但有九卷其優波離問受戒法即後單卷菩薩善戒經是。
translation: There are only nine fascicles in which Upāli asks about the rules for receiving precepts, which are the latter single-fascicle sutras on the good bodhisattva precepts.

source_sentence: 若將此為初卷。
translation: If this is the first roll, then it's consistent with Yogâcārabhūmi's commentary.

source_sentence: 即與祐記符同。
translation: That would be consistent with Yogâcāra's explanation.

source_sentence: 然此地持經本離之已久。
translation: However, this is a scripture that has been separated from the original for a long time.

source_sentence: 乍合成十卷或恐生疑。
translation: Perhaps doubts will arise if it's first combined into ten fascicles.

source_sentence: 此善戒經亦同地持作其三段。
translation: This sutra on the good morality is also the same as the Earth-holder's Commentary, which is divided into three sections.

source_sentence: 第一段名菩薩地有二十品。
translation: The first section is called "The Bodhisattva Ground," which has twenty levels.

source_sentence: 第二段名如住有四品。
translation: The second section is called the stage of thus abiding, which has four levels.

source_sentence: 第三段名畢竟地有六品。
translation: The third section is called the stage of finality, which has six chapters.

source_sentence: 祐云次第列品者。
translation: (You say that the grades are listed in order.

source_sentence: 恐尋之未審)。
translation: I'm afraid it's not been thoroughly investigated.")

source_sentence: 淨業障經一卷失譯　今附秦錄單本
translation: One volume of the Sutra on Purifying the Karmic Hindrances was lost in translation, and now I'll attach a single copy from the Qin Canon.

source_sentence: 上二經十卷同帙(其淨業障經法上錄云竺法護譯詳其文句與護公譯經意勢全異故為失譯)。
translation: The above two scriptures are in the same ten volume set (the Sutra on the Purification of Karmic Hindrances was translated by Zhu Faju according to the Fashang Record, but its text and phrases differ completely from the meaning of the sutra translated by Hogong, so it was lost in translation).

source_sentence: 優婆塞戒經七卷(其在家菩薩戒或五或六或七)　北涼天竺三藏曇無懺於姑臧譯單本梵網經二卷姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯第二譯前本闕受十善戒經一卷後漢失譯　拾遺編入單本受菩提心戒儀一卷(經內題云最上乘教受戒懺悔文普賢瑜伽阿闍梨集)　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄上四經十一卷同帙。
translation: The seven-fascicle Sutra of the Upāsaka Precepts (either five, six, or seven of the lay practitioners of the bodhisattva precepts) was translated into a single two-fascicle edition of the Sutra of Brahmā's Net by the Northern Liang, Tianzang, Zhu, and Tan Wuqian in Guzang, and the second translation by the Yaoqin Tripiṭaka Kumārajī translator of the previous edition, which lacked a single volume of the Sutra on the Ten Good Moral Practices, was lost in translation in the later Han Dynasty.

source_sentence: 菩薩瓔珞本業經二卷(或無菩薩字新編為律)　姚秦涼州沙門竺佛念譯第一譯　三譯二闕佛藏經四卷(一名選擇諸法經或二卷或三卷)　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本菩薩戒本一卷(出地持戒品中慈氏菩薩說)北涼天竺三藏曇無讖於姑臧譯　拾遺編入第二譯菩薩戒本一卷(出瑜伽論本地分中菩薩地彌勒菩薩說)　三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第三譯右二經同本異譯(前後三譯一譯本闕)菩薩戒羯磨文一卷(出瑜伽論本地分中菩薩地彌勒菩薩說)。
translation: 菩薩瓔珞本業經二卷(或無菩薩字新編為律)　姚秦涼州沙門竺佛念譯第一譯　三譯二闕佛藏經四卷(一名選擇諸法經或二卷或三卷)　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本菩薩戒本一卷(出地持戒品中慈氏菩薩說)北涼天竺三藏曇無讖於姑臧譯　拾遺編入第二譯菩薩戒本一卷(出瑜伽論本地分中菩薩地彌勒菩薩說)　三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第三譯右二經同本異譯(前後三譯一譯本闕)菩薩戒羯磨文一卷(出瑜伽論本地分中菩薩地彌勒菩薩說)。

translation: Sutra of the Good Morality of the Bodhisattva, One Volume (Upāli's Questions on the Method of Receiving the Bodhisattva Precepts) Song Dynasty (960-1279), Tripiṭaka of Kāśyapa, translated from the single copy of the above six scriptures into ten volumes.

source_sentence: 菩薩內戒經一卷

translation: One volume of the Upāsaka Five Precepts Sutra of Regulations, translated by Kunabhadra, the Tripiṭaka of Kāśmīra, the Song Dynasty, and the translation by Kunabhadra of the Tripiṭaka of Kāśmīra, the Song Dynasty (to the right, this Upāsaka Five Precepts Sutra of Regulations was mistakenly compiled in the lesser vehicle vinaya, as it was first the text of the bodhisattva precepts and then the text of the bodhisattva precepts and the rules for confession.)

translation: Wenshushili jinglu jing 1 roll (or just jinglu jing) Xijin sanzang zhu fahui transliteration The first translation of the Qingjing pinifangguang jing 1 roll Yaoqin sanzang kuomo lashi translation out of the Fashang lu The third translation of the jingtiyin suowen jing 1 roll (a tathāgata's explanation of the Jingjin tiaofu jing) Song shaman shi fahai translation The fourth translation of the right three sūtras are the same text and different translations (the first and last four translations and one translation are missing).

source_sentence: 大乘三聚懺悔經一卷
translation: Sutra of Repentance for the Three Classes of Mahāyāna One Fascicle

source_sentence: 隋天竺三藏闍那崛多等譯出內典錄單本菩薩五法懺悔文一卷(或云菩薩五法懺悔經失譯)今附梁錄單本菩薩藏經一卷　梁扶南三藏僧伽婆羅譯單本三曼陀颰陀羅菩薩經一卷　西晉清信士聶道真譯單本菩薩受齋經一卷　西晉清信士聶道真譯第二譯　三譯三闕文殊悔過經一卷　一名文殊五體悔過經西晉三藏竺法護譯　第一譯　兩譯一闕舍利弗悔過經一卷亦直云悔過經　後漢安息三藏安世高譯第一譯三譯二闕法律三昧經一卷(亦直云法律經)　吳月支優婆塞支謙譯第二譯兩譯一闕十善業道經一卷　大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯新編入錄上十四經十四卷同帙。
translation: The Sui Tianzhu Tripiṭaka, the Jñānagupta and others, translated a single volume of the Sutra of Repentance of the Five Bodhisattva Practices from the Internal Canon (or the Sutra of Repentance of the Five Bodhisattva Practices was lost in translation) into a single volume of the Sutra of the Bodhisattva Canon from the Liang Record.

source_sentence: (謹按舊錄大乘律中有寶梁經迦葉經今為編入寶積會中故不重出其大方廣三戒經與寶積三律儀會同本決定毘尼經與寶積優波離會同本今並編入寶積部中故此不載)。
translation: (According to the old records, among the great vehicle vinaya scriptures there is the Baoliang jing and the Kāśyapa jing, which are now compiled into the Baoding assembly and therefore not reprinted.)

source_sentence: 菩薩對法藏九十九部五百二十卷五十帙菩薩阿毘達磨有其二類。
translation: There are two kinds of bodhisattva abhidharma in the ninety-nine books, five hundred and twenty volumes, and fifty books of the Dharma collection.

source_sentence: 一者解釋契經。
translation: One is to explain the scriptures.

source_sentence: 二者詮法體相。
translation: The second is to explain the essence and characteristics of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 舊錄所載和雜遍之。
translation: The older records contain a mixture of them.

source_sentence: 今所集者分為二例。
translation: The one collected here is divided into two examples.

source_sentence: 釋契經者列之於前。
translation: Those who explain the sutras are listed in the preceding section.

source_sentence: 詮法性者編之於後。
translation: The one that explains the nature of the Dharma is compiled at the end.

source_sentence: 庶無糅雜。
translation: There's no mix and match.

source_sentence: 覽者易知。
translation: It's easy for those who see it to understand.

source_sentence: 大乘釋經論二十二部一百五十五卷一十五帙大智度論一百卷(或一百一十卷或七十卷)　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本右龍樹菩薩造釋摩訶般若波羅蜜經(什法師云若具足翻應有千卷秦人識弱故略之十分存一)。
translation: There are twenty-two great vehicle scriptures and treatises, one hundred and fifty-five volumes and fifteen books, and one hundred (or one hundred and ten or seventy) volumes of the Mahāprajñāpāramitā sūtra, translated by Kumārajīvaṇa, the Yaoqin Tripiṭaka, in a single copy.

source_sentence: 十地經論十二卷(或十五卷一帙)　　元魏天竺三藏菩提流支等譯單本右天親菩薩造。
translation: Shidi jinglun 十二卷(或十五卷一篇) 元魏天竺三藏菩提流支等譯单本右天親菩薩造。

source_sentence: 釋十地經。
translation: This is an explanation of the Ten Stages Sutra.

source_sentence: 即華嚴十地品是。
translation: It's called the Huayan shidi pin.

source_sentence: (論序云菩提留支勒那摩提在洛陽殿內三人同譯佛陀扇多傳語帝親筆受長房錄中流之摩提二錄俱載者不然今合為一本)在留支錄。
translation: (The preface to the treatise says that Bodhiruci, Lena, and Mati translated the Sutra of the Ten Stages together in the Luoyang hall.

source_sentence: 彌勒菩薩所問經論五卷(或六卷或七卷或十卷)　元魏天竺菩提留支譯單本右釋彌勒所問經即寶積經　第四十一會是。
translation: The Treatise on the Sutra of Maitreya's Questions is a five-volume work (or six, seven, or ten volumes) that was translated into a single edition by Bodhiruci in Tianzhu, Yuanwei, to the right of the Maitreya's Questions sutra, the forty-first rendition of the Baoji jing.

source_sentence: 大乘寶積經論四卷　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯　第一譯兩譯一闕右釋舊單卷大寶積經。
translation: Dasheng baoji jinglun 4 volumes 元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯 首譯兩譯一缺右解释旧单卷大寶積經。

source_sentence: 即寶積第四十三會是。
translation: This is the forty-third rendition of the Sutra of Jewel Accumulation.

source_sentence: 寶髻菩薩四法經論一卷　天親菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏毘目智仙等譯　出序記單本右釋大集經寶髻品。
translation: Jewel-topknot Bodhisattva's Exposition of the Four Sets of Practices One Fascicle Bodhisattva Tianxin's Translation Yuanwei Tianzang Sanzang Vimue Zhixian et al. Out of the Preface Record Single Edition Right Explanation of the Jewel-topknot Chapter of the Sutra of the Great Collection.

source_sentence: 今入寶積。
translation: It now enters the Jewel Heap.

source_sentence: 在第四十七會。
translation: It's in the forty-seventh assembly.

source_sentence: (論序記云魏興和三年歲次辛酉九月朔庚午之日烏萇國人剎利王種三藏法師毘目智仙中天竺國婆羅門人瞿曇流之護法大士驃騎大將軍開府儀同三司御史中尉勃海高中蜜愛法之人沙門曇道俗相假於鄴城內在金華寺譯四千九百九十七字諸錄皆云菩提留支譯者誤也今依序記為正)。
translation: (The preface to the treatise states that on the day of the first day of the ninth month of the year xingyou in the third year of the reign of Wei's reign, the Tripiṭaka Master Bhīmu Zhixian, a native of the country of Wudu, a Brahman from the middle kingdom of India, and Gautama Liu's Dharma protector, was translated at the Jinhua Temple by the ascetic Dharma-lover Dharma-lover Tan Dao, a layman from Bohai High School, in the city of Jingshan, according to the preface, into 4,997 words.)

source_sentence: 上三論十卷同帙。
translation: The above three treatises are in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 佛地經論七卷(親光等菩薩造釋佛地經)　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本金剛般若論二卷　無著菩薩造　隋天竺三藏達摩笈多譯出內典錄單本能斷金剛般若波羅蜜多經論頌一卷　無著菩薩造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄上三論十卷同帙。
translation: The Treatise on the Buddha-stage Sutra (7 vols.) (translated by Xuanzang, the Tang Tripiṭaka, from the Inner Canon, a single copy of the Treatise on the Diamond Sutra (2 vols.) (made by the Bodhisattva Wujue) The Sui Tianzang Tripiṭaka, Dharmagupta, from the Inner Canon, a single copy of the Verses on the Diamond Sutra (1 vol.) (made by the Bodhisattva Wujue) The Tang Tripiṭaka, Yijing, translated, and newly compiled into the Record of the Three Treatises (10 vols.) (the same volume).

source_sentence: 金剛般若波羅蜜經論三卷　天親菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯第一譯能斷金剛般若波羅蜜多經論三卷　無著菩薩頌　世親菩薩釋　大唐三藏義淨譯第二譯新編入錄右二論及頌同本異譯。
translation: Treatise on the Sutra of Adamantine Transcendent Wisdom, Three Volumes, Translated by Bodhiruci, the Tripiṭaka of India, Yuanwei, and the First Translation, Three Volumes, Treatise on the Sutra of Adamantine Transcendent Wisdom, Verses, Translated by Shijin, the Tripiṭaka of the Tang, Second Translation, Newly Compiled and Recorded, Right Two Treatises and Verses, Same Text, Different Translation.

source_sentence: 金剛般若波羅蜜經破取著不壞假名論二卷(功德施菩薩造亦云功德施論)　大唐中天竺三藏地婆訶羅譯出大周錄單本(上四論及頌造者雖異並釋金剛般若經又有金剛仙論十卷尋閱文理乃是元魏三藏菩提流支所撰釋天親論既非梵本翻傳所以此中不載)。
translation: (The above four treatises and verses were translated from a single copy of the Dazhou Record, even though they were written by a different maker and interpreted the Vajra Prajñāpāramitā Sutra.

source_sentence: 文殊師利菩薩問菩提經論一卷一名伽耶山頂經論　婆藪盤豆菩薩造　元魏三藏菩提流支譯單本妙法蓮華經論一卷　婆藪盤豆菩薩造　元魏中天竺三藏勒那摩提共僧朗等譯　第二譯上五論十卷同帙。
translation: Wenshushili pusa wen podi jing lun 1 volume a gaya shanting jing lun Vasubandhu pusa zhuan wei sanzang pudiliuzhi translation Shanben miaofa lianhua jing lun 1 volume Vasubandhu pusa zhuan wei zhongtianzhang sanzang lenamati xingshenglang et al. translation The second translation of the above five treatises is in ten volumes.

source_sentence: 法華經論二卷初有歸命頌者或一卷　元魏北天竺三藏菩提留支共曇林等譯拾遺編入第二譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: The Fahua jing lun (Fahua jing lun) is a two-fascicle translation of the first one, or a one-volume translation by the Northern Tianzang Sanzang Bodhiruci together with Tanlin and others, compiled into the second translation of the right two treatises, which are the same text and a different translation.

source_sentence: (其三藏義淨新譯法華論五卷尋本未獲)。
translation: (The five-volume edition of the Tripiṭaka Translation of the Lotus Sutra was not found).

source_sentence: 勝思惟梵天所問經論四卷(釋勝思惟經或三卷)元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本涅槃論一卷　婆藪盤豆菩薩造略釋　沙門達摩菩提譯不知年代內典中附元魏代第一譯後闕本涅槃經本有今無偈論一卷(釋涅槃一頌)　梁天竺三藏真諦譯單本遺教經論一卷釋遺教經　陳天竺三藏真諦譯拾遺編入單本無量壽經論一卷　婆藪盤豆菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本三具足經論一卷(天親菩薩造有釋論無經本)　元魏天竺三藏毘目智仙等譯　出序記單本(右論初云三藏法師毘目智仙婆羅門人瞿曇留支愛敬法人沙門曇林於鄴城內在金華寺魏興和三年歲次辛酉月建在戌朔次庚午十三日譯千百十言驃騎大將軍開府儀同三司御史中尉勃海高仲蜜啟請供養守護流通諸錄皆云菩提留支譯者誤也今依序記為正)。
translation: The four-volume Treatise on the Sutra of Victorious Contemplation of the Questions of Brahmā (or three volumes of the Treatise on Victorious Contemplation) was translated into a single volume of the Nirvana Treatise by Bodhiruci, the Tianzang Tripiṭaka of Yuan Wei, Zhu Dynasty, and a single volume of the Nirvana Treatise by Vasubandhu Bodhisattva, abridged by Shaman Dharma Bodhisattva, whose age is unknown in the inner scriptures, and a single volume of the Nirvana Treatise (a verse explaining the Nirvana), which is missing from the first translation of the Yuan Wei Dynasty, and a single volume of the Treatise on the Deathbed Sutra (a verse explaining the Nirvana), which is missing from the present.

source_sentence: 轉法輪經論一卷(天親菩薩造有釋論無經本)　元魏天竺三藏毘目智仙等譯　出序記單本(右論初記云魏驃騎大將軍開府儀同三司御史中尉勃海高仲密善求義方選真簡偽故請法師毘目智仙并其弟子瞿曇流支於鄴城內在金華寺興和三年歲次大梁建酉之月朔次庚子十一日譯三千九百四十二言沙門曇林對譯諸記錄皆云菩提流支譯者誤也今依序記為正)。
translation: The Turning of the Wheel of the Dharma Sutra Treatise in One Volume (A translation of the Treatise by Tianxin Pusa, with an explication and no sūtra text), translated by the Yuan Wei Tianzhu Tripiṭaka Vimuzi Zhixian and others, out of a single preface notation (the first notation of the right treatise says that the Wei prussian general, Kaifu Yisheng Sanji, and the imperial court lieutenant, Bohai Gaozhongmi, were adept at seeking the truth, simplicity, and falsity, so they invited the Dharma teacher Vimuzi Zhixian and his disciple Gautama Ruchi to translate it on the 11th day of the first month of the 3rd year of the reign of Jiangyou at Jinghasi, into 3,942 words by the ascetic Tanlin, and the records all say that the translator Bodhiruci was mistaken, but I rely on the preface notation as correct).

source_sentence: 上八論十二卷同帙。
translation: (The above eight treatises are in twelve volumes.

source_sentence: 大乘集義論七十八部三百六十五卷三十五帙瑜伽師地論一百卷　彌勒菩薩說十帙　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單重合譯(右此瑜伽論梁代三藏真諦譯者名十七地論只得五卷緣礙遂輟北涼三藏曇無讖譯地持論但成十卷乃是本地分中菩薩地此瑜伽論當第三譯前之二本部帙不終大唐譯者方具備矣)。
translation: Dasheng ji yi lun seventy-eight three hundred and sixty-five volumes thirty-five books yogâcārabhūmi one hundred volumes Maitreya ten books translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Tang Dynasty Xuanzang out of the internal canonical records single and double translation (right this yogâcārabhūmi Liang Dynasty Tripiṭaka True Truth translator of the name of the seventeen ground theory only five volumes of conditions and hindrances so drop out of the Northern Liang Tripiṭaka Tan Wujian translation ground support theory but into ten volumes is the local part of the bodhisattva ground this yogâcārabhūmi when the third translation of the previous two main books not end the Great Tang translator side has carried on).

source_sentence: 顯揚聖教論二十卷　無著菩薩造二帙　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本瑜伽師地論釋一卷　最勝子等菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出翻經圖單本顯揚聖教論頌一卷　無著菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本王法正理論一卷　彌勒菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本大乘阿毘達磨集論七卷　無著菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本上四論十卷同帙。
translation: The Exoteric Exegesis of the Noble Teaching, 20 volumes, translated by the Bodhisattva Maitreya into two volumes, translated by the Tripiṭaka Xuanzang into a single volume of the Commentary on the Yogâcārabhūmi, one volume, translated by the Bodhisattva Zuishengzi and others, translated by the Tripiṭaka Xuanzang into a single volume of the Verses of the Exoteric Exegesis, one volume, translated by the Bodhisattva Maitreya into a single volume of the Correct Principles of the Royal Dharma, one volume, translated by the Tripiṭaka Xuanzang into a single volume, and translated by the Bodhisattva Maitreya into a single volume of the Collected Discourses of the Great Vehicle Abhidharma, seven volumes, translated by the Tripiṭaka Xuanzang into a single volume, translated by the Bodhisattva Maitreya into a ten volume set of the same volume.

source_sentence: 大乘阿毘達磨雜集論十六卷　安慧菩薩揉釋上集論　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本中論四卷　龍樹菩薩本　梵志青白釋　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本上二論二十卷二帙。
translation: Dasheng abhidharma zajilun 16 volumes 安慧菩薩揉釋上集論 大唐三藏玄奘譯出内典錄單本中論四卷 龍樹菩薩本 梵志青白釋 姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本上二論 20 volumes 二帙s.

source_sentence: 般若燈論釋十五卷(龍樹菩薩本分別明菩薩釋)　大唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯出內典錄單本右與中論本同釋異。
translation: Fifteen Fascicle Explanation of the Prajñāpradīpa-mūlamadhyamaka-vṛtti (Longtree's Commentary on the Bodhisattva-Vibhāga) Translated from the Buddhist Canon by Bhārapamitra of India in the Tang Dynasty to the right of the single edition of the Record of Buddhist Texts, which is the same as the one in the Mūlamadhyamaka-vṛtti.

source_sentence: 十二門論一卷　龍樹菩薩造　　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本十八空論一卷　陳天竺三藏真諦譯出翻經圖百論二卷　提婆菩薩造　婆藪開士釋　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本廣百論本一卷　聖天菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本上五論二十卷二帙。
translation: Dvādaśataka-bodhisattva's translation of the Tripiṭaka of Yaoqin, Kumārajīva's translation of the single edition of the Treatise on the Eighteen Aspects of Emptiness, one volume; the Tripiṭaka of Chen Tianzhu, True Truth's translation of the translation of the Sutra of the One Hundred Treatises, two volumes; and the Tripiṭaka of Vasubandhu's translation of the Yaoqin Tripiṭaka, Kumārajīva's translation of the single edition of the Extensive One Hundred Treatises, one volume; the Tripiṭaka of Shengtian's translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang, Xuanzang's translation of the single edition of the Record of the Canon, the upper five treatises, twenty volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 大乘廣百論釋論十卷　聖天本護法釋　大唐三藏玄奘譯(出內典錄單本)十住毘婆沙論十四卷　龍樹菩薩造或十二或十五　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯出內典錄單本菩提資糧論六卷　聖者龍樹本　比丘自在釋　隋天竺三藏達摩笈多譯出內典錄單本上二論二十卷二帙。
translation: Dasheng guang bai lun shi lun 10 volumes Shōtoku ben huifa shi Translation by Xuanzang of the Tang Tripiṭaka (from the monograph in the Inner Canon) 14 volumes Shizhu pibāsā lun Longtree pusa zhuan or 12 or 15 volumes Yaoqin Tripiṭaka kumāraš translation from the monograph in the Inner Canon Bodhisambhāra 6 volumes Shōtoku longtoku ben bijū zizai shi Sui Tianzang Tripiṭaka dharmagupta translation from the monograph in the Inner Canon Shangji lun 20 volumes and 2 books.

source_sentence: 大乘莊嚴論十三卷　無著菩薩造　或十五卷　一帙　　大唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯出內典錄單本大莊嚴論十五卷(馬鳴菩薩造或十卷)　姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本順中論二卷　無著菩薩造　元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯　出序記單本(右順中論序記云魏尚書令儀同高公延國上賓瞿曇流支在第供養正通佛法對釋曇林出斯義論武定元年歲次癸亥八月十日揮辭景寅凡有一萬三千七百二十七字諸錄皆云菩提留支譯者誤也依序記為正)。
translation: Dasheng zhuangyan lun 13 volumes Wuzhuo pusa zhuan or 15 volumes a book Datang tianzang tanzang prabhāmitra translatio nei canon record single book Dasheng zhuangyan lun 15 volumes (maming pusa zhuan or 10 volumes) Yaoqin tanzang kumāra shishi translatio nei canon Shunzhong lun 2 volumes Wuzhuo pusa zhuan Yuanwei brāhmaṇa gautama prajñāruci translatio nei preface record single book (right Shunzhong lun preface record yun Wei shangshu ling yi tong gong yanguo shangbin gautama lüci in di offerings Zhengtong fo fa xiaosi jingin where there are 13,727 characters all records say bodhiruci translator error also rely on the preface record as correct).

source_sentence: 攝大乘論三卷　無著菩薩造　陳天竺三藏真諦譯第二譯上三論二十卷二帙。
translation: The Compendium of the Great Vehicle (3 volumes), produced by the Bodhisattva Wujue and translated by the Tripiṭaka of Chen-Tianzhu, is the second translation of the above three treatises in twenty volumes and two books.

source_sentence: 攝大乘論二卷　無著菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏佛陀扇多譯　第一譯攝大乘論本三卷　無著菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄　第三譯右三本論同本異譯。
translation: The two-volume Compendium of the Great Vehicle (Compendium of the Great Vehicle), made by the Bodhisattva Wujue and translated by the Yuan Wei Tianzhu Tripiṭaka Buddhasanta, was the first translation of the three-volume Compendium of the Great Vehicle (Compendium of the Great Vehicle), made by the Bodhisattva Wujue and translated by the Tang Tripiṭaka Xuanzang from the Internal Canon's Record, and the third translation of the three right-hand treatises into the same text and different translations.

source_sentence: 攝大乘論釋十五卷　世親菩薩造　或十二卷　陳天竺三藏真諦譯　第一譯上三論二十卷二帙。
translation: The fifteen-volume Commentary on the Compendium of the Great Vehicle, made by Bhagavān, or twelve volumes, was translated by the Tripiṭaka of Chen-Tianzhu into two of the twenty volumes of the first translation of the three above-mentioned treatises.

source_sentence: (右按仁壽大周等錄復有攝論一本一十二卷成部亦云真諦所譯勘與此同今者但存一本)。
translation: (Right, according to the Renshou Dazhou et al. Record, there is another collection of twelve volumes of the Treatise, which is also translated by the Zenchi and is the same as this one.)

source_sentence: 攝大乘論釋論十卷　世親菩薩釋一帙　陳天竺三藏達多笈多譯出內典錄第三譯攝大乘論釋十卷　世親菩薩造一帙　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第二譯右三釋論同本異譯。
translation: The ten volumes of the Commentary on the Compendium of the Great Vehicle are translated into one volume by the Bhagavān Bodhisattva, the third translation from the Catalogue of Buddhist Texts by the Tripiṭaka of India, the third translation from the Catalogue of Buddhist Texts by the Bhagavān Bodhisattva, and the second translation from the Catalogue of Buddhist Texts by Xuanzang of the Tripiṭaka of the Tang.

source_sentence: 攝大乘論釋十卷　無著菩薩造一帙　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本右與前三論同本異譯。
translation: Ten Fascicle Commentary on the Compendium of the Great Vehicle: A Single Translation by the Bodhisattva Wujue, Translated by the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang, Xuanzang, and Recorded in the Inner Canon, Right, and a Different Translation of the Same Text as the First Three Treatises.

source_sentence: 佛性論四卷　天親菩薩造　陳天竺三藏真諦譯單本決定藏論三卷　梁天竺三藏真諦譯單本(右此決定藏論大周錄中乃云失譯而不指言何代翻出今詳此論大勢乃是真諦所翻論中子注乃曰梁言前代錄家遺之不上今為真諦所譯編於梁代錄中)。
translation: Four volumes of the Buddha-nature Treatise, made by the Bodhisattva Tianxin, a single translation by the Tripiṭaka of Chen and Tianzhu, and a single translation by the Tripiṭaka of Liang and Tianzhu, a single translation by the Tripiṭaka of Chen (to the right, the Tripiṭaka of Chen and Tianzhu, a single translation by the Tripiṭaka of Liang, is a lost translation without specifying the generation in which it was translated.)

source_sentence: 辦中邊論頌一卷　彌勒菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本中邊分別論二卷　婆藪盤豆造或三卷　陳天竺三藏真諦譯第一譯上四論十卷同帙。
translation: (1) Verses on the Preparation of the Madhyânta-vibhāga (1 volume): Maitreya-bodhisattva's translation; (2) Single edition of the Madhyânta-vibhāga (2 volumes): Vasubandhu's translation or three volumes; (3) First translation of the four above-mentioned treatises in ten volumes: Chen Tianzhu's translation of the Tripiṭaka of the True Truth.

source_sentence: 辦中邊論三卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第二譯右二釋論同本異譯。
translation: (Skt. śrāvaka-middle-periphery-śāstra), three volumes; (Skt. śrāvaka-bodhisattva), the second translation from the Catalogue of Buddhist Texts; and (Skt. śāstra-vikrāmin), the second translation from the Catalogue of Buddhist Texts.

source_sentence: 究竟一乘寶性論四卷　或三卷或五卷　元魏天竺三藏勒那摩提譯第二譯　兩譯一闕(右論序記云魏興和三年歲次大梁七月辛未朔二十五日驃騎大將軍開府儀同三司御史中尉勃海高仲密敬請三藏法師烏萇國人中天竺國婆羅門人瞿曇流支釋曇林等在鄴城內金華寺譯四千八百七十二字序三藏雖不斥名准例即是毘目智仙群錄直云瞿曇流支譯者誤也今依序記為正)。
translation: The final One Vehicle Jewel Nature Treatise is a four-volume, three-volume, or five-volume translation of the second translation by the Yuan Wei Tianzang Sanzang Lena Mathie, with two translations and one missing (the preface to the right treatise records that the Wei dynasty invited the Sanzang fashions to be translated at the Jinhua Temple in Wuduo by Gautama, a Brahmin from the Middle Kingdom of India, and by Shi Tanlin, a 4,872-character preface by the Sanzang, although it doesn't refute the name and follows the example of the Vimokṣaprajña group of records, which directly states that Gautama's translation is incorrect.)

source_sentence: 大乘成業論一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第二譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: The Mahāyāna Treatise on Becoming Karma in One Volume: A Translation by Bhagavān Xuanzang of the Tang Tripiṭaka from the Second Translation of the Internal Canon

source_sentence: 因明正理門論本一卷　大域龍菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第一譯上五論十卷同帙。
translation: Commentary on the Nyāyamukha, a one-volume work by the Bodhisattva Daji Long, translated from the Tang Tripiṭaka by Xuanzang, and translated into the Inner Canon in the same volume as the previous five commentaries.

source_sentence: 因明正理門論一卷　大域龍菩薩造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄第二譯右二論同本異譯　舊理門論周錄為單本新勘為重譯。
translation: The first volume of the Nyāyamukha-vikrīḍita-śāstra is a new translation of the second volume of the Nyāyamukha-śāstra into the canon, and the second volume of the old Nyāyamukha-śāstra is a new translation of a single volume.

source_sentence: 因明入正理論一卷　商羯羅主菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本顯識論一卷內題云顯識品從無相論出　陳天竺三藏真諦譯出論題單本附陳代錄轉識論一卷即出前顯識論　天竺三藏真諦譯出論題單本附陳代錄唯識論一卷一名破色心初云唯識無境界　元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯第一譯大乘唯識論一卷初云修道不共他　上二論並天親造　陳天竺三藏真諦譯第二譯。
translation: The Inmyō nyū shōkara shōtoku shōtoku bodhisattva da tang samizō xuanzang translates the single volume of the internal canonical records as a manifestation of consciousness in one volume, the title of which is "The Chapter on the Manifestation of Consciousness" and the title of which is "The Discourse on the Transformation of Consciousness" in one volume, which is the manifestation of consciousness in the previous volume.

source_sentence: 右三論同本異譯周錄不言同本新勘為重譯。
translation: The right three treatises are the same text and different translations, and Zhoulu doesn't say that they are the same text and the new translation is a retranslation.

source_sentence: 唯識二十論一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出翻經圖第三譯成唯識寶生論五卷一名二十唯識順釋論　護法菩薩造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本唯識三十論一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本拾遺編入上九論十三卷同帙。
translation: The Twenty Verses on Consciousness-only in One Volume: Made by Bhadrapāla, the Tripiṭaka of the Tang Dynasty, Xuanzang's Translation of the Third Translation of the Sutra into Five Volumes of the Jewel-Arising Treatise on Consciousness-only in One Volume: The Thirty Verses on Consciousness-only in One Volume: Made by Bhadrapāla, the Tripiṭaka of the Tang Dynasty, Xuanzang's Translation of the Internal Canon in One Volume: Gleanings from the Compilation of the Last Nine Treatises in Thirteen Volumes.

source_sentence: 成唯識論十卷　護法等菩薩造一帙　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本大丈夫論二卷　提婆菩薩造　北涼沙門釋　道泰譯出翻經圖單本入大乘論二卷　堅意菩薩造　北涼沙門釋道泰譯出內典錄大乘掌珍論二卷　清辦菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄大乘五蘊論一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第二譯初譯本闕大乘廣五蘊論一卷　安慧菩薩造與前論異本　大唐中天竺三藏地婆訶羅譯出大周錄單本寶行王正論一卷　陳天竺三藏真諦譯單本大乘起信論一卷　馬鳴菩薩造　梁天竺三藏真諦譯第一譯上七論十卷同帙。
translation: Cheng weishilun 十卷 護法等菩薩造一篇 大唐三藏玄奘譯出内典錄單本大丈夫論二卷提婆菩薩造 北涼沙門釋 道泰譯出翻經圖單本入大乘論二卷 堅意菩薩造 北涼沙門釋道泰譯出内典錄大乘掌珍論二卷 清辦菩薩造 大唐三藏玄奘譯出内典錄大乘五蘊論一卷 世親菩薩造 大唐三藏玄奘譯出内典錄第二譯初譯本闕大乘廣五蘊論一卷 安慧菩薩造与前論異本 大唐中天竺三藏提婆哈羅譯出大周錄單本寶行王正論一卷 陳天竺三藏真諦譯單本大乘起信論一卷 馬鳴菩薩造 梁天竺三藏真諦譯第一譯上七論十卷同帙。

source_sentence: 大乘起信論二卷　馬鳴菩薩造　大唐天后代于闐三藏實叉難陀譯新編入錄第二譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: Dasheng qixinlun 2 volumes, made by Ma Ming bodhisattva The second translation of the new compilation of the Yutan Tripiṭaka of the descendants of the Great Tang Dynasty, the second translation of the right two treatises, is a variant translation of the same text.

source_sentence: 舊起信論。
translation: The old Awakening of Faith Treatise.

source_sentence: 周錄為單本。
translation: The Cūḷapanthaka is a single edition.

source_sentence: 新勘為重譯。
translation: The new edition is a re-translation.

source_sentence: 發菩提心論二卷或云發菩提心經
translation: Arising of the Mind of Enlightenment: Two Fascicle Treatise or Arising of the Mind of Enlightenment Sutra

source_sentence: 姚秦三藏鳩摩羅什譯單本
translation: Yaoqin Tripiṭaka Kumārajīva Translation of the Monks' List

source_sentence: (右此發菩提心論大周錄中經論二錄俱有其名今以菩薩所造編於論錄但存一本或云天親菩薩所造亦云彌勒菩薩所說未詳孰是)。
translation: (Right. This Arising of the Mind of Enlightenment Treatise has its name in both the sūtras and the treatises in the Dazhou lu. Now, the one compiled by the bodhisattvas in the treatise lu is either made by Tianxin or by Maitreya, but we don't know which one is correct.)

source_sentence: 金剛頂瑜伽中發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心論一卷瑜伽總持教門說菩提心觀行修持義　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄三無性論二卷出無相論或一卷　陳天竺三藏真諦譯單本方便心論一卷凡四品或二卷　元魏西域沙門吉迦夜共曇曜譯第二譯　兩譯一闕如實論一卷題云如實論反質難品　梁天竺三藏真諦譯單本無相思塵論一卷或直云思塵論　陳天竺三藏真諦譯出翻經圖第一譯觀所緣論一卷　陳那菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄第二譯右二論同本異譯周錄不言同本新勘為重譯。
translation: In the Vajraśekhara Yoga, the Treatise on Arising the Mind of Avalokitêśvara Samyak-saṃgha is a one-volume summary of the doctrinal approach of the yoga that explains the practice of observing and cultivating the mind of enlightenment. The Tripiṭaka Master of the Temple of Prosperity, the Great Guangzhi Bhikṣong, was instructed to translate the three volumes of the Catalogue of the New Entry Zhenyan List of the Treatise on the Nature of Nothingness into two volumes, the Exodus Treatise on the Formlessness of Being, or one volume.

source_sentence: 觀所緣論釋一卷　護法菩薩造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本上九論十二卷同帙。
translation: Guan suoyuan lun shiyi 1 roll 護法菩薩造 大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本上九論 十二卷同篇。

source_sentence: 廻諍論一卷　龍樹菩薩造出序記
translation: Reversing the Controversy: A Commentary One Volume, Prologue, Created by Nāgârjuna Bodhisattva

source_sentence: 元魏天竺三藏毘目智仙等譯單本
translation: Yuan Dynasty Tianzang Tripiṭaka Vimok Zixian et al. Translation of a Single Text

source_sentence: (右論序記云魏興和三年歲次大梁建辰之月朔次癸酉辛卯之日烏萇國人剎利王種三藏法師毘目智仙共天竺國婆羅門人瞿曇流支在鄴城內金華寺譯凡有一萬一千九十八字沙門曇林之筆驃騎大將軍開府儀同三司御史中尉勃海高仲密啟請供養群錄直云瞿曇流支譯者誤也今依序記為正)。
translation: (The preface to the right-hand treatise states that in the third year of the reign of Wei's reign, the second month of the birth year of Daliang, the second month of the birth year of Kanyakubja, the day of the birth year of Kanyakubja, the Tripiṭaka Master Bhīsmāra, and the Brahmin Gautama, the native of Wuduo, translated the 11,988-word text at Jinhua Temple in Tianzhu, by the writing of the ascetic Tanlin, the general who opened the office, the three divisions of the imperial court, and the lieutenant of the imperial court, Bohai Gao Zhongyi, who requested the offerings to the community.)

source_sentence: 緣生論一卷　聖者欝楞伽造　隋天竺三藏達摩笈多譯出內典錄單本大乘緣生論一卷經中云聖者欝楞伽造　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄十二因緣論一卷　淨意菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本壹輸盧伽論一卷　龍樹菩薩造　元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯單本大乘百法明門論一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本百字論一卷　提婆菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本解捲論一卷　陳天竺三藏真諦譯　出翻經圖　第一譯掌中論一卷　陳那菩薩造　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄第二譯右二論同本異譯。
translation: 緣生論一卷　聖者欝楞伽造　隋天竺三藏達摩笈多譯出內典錄單本大乘緣生論一卷經中云聖者欝楞伽造　大興善寺三藏沙門大廣智不空奉詔譯貞元新入目錄十二因緣論一卷　淨意菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本壹輸盧伽論一卷　龍樹菩薩造　元魏婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯單本大乘百法明門論一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏玄奘譯出內典錄單本百字論一卷　提婆菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本解捲論一卷　陳天竺三藏真諦譯　出翻經圖　第一譯掌中論一卷　陳那菩薩造　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄第二譯右二論同本異譯。

source_sentence: 其解棬論周錄為單本新勘為重譯。
translation: The Jietianlun Zhoulu is a single new translation of the same text.

source_sentence: 取因假設論一卷　陳那菩薩造　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本觀總相論一卷　陳那菩薩造　　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本止觀門論頌一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本手杖論一卷　尊者釋迦稱造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本六門教授習定論一卷　無著菩薩本　世親菩薩釋　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本大乘法界無差別論一卷　堅慧菩薩造　大唐天后代于闐三藏提雲般若譯出大周錄單本破外道小乘四宗論一卷　提婆菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提流支譯單本破外道小乘涅槃論一卷　提婆菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本上十七論十七卷同帙。
translation: 取因假設論一卷　陳那菩薩造　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本觀總相論一卷　陳那菩薩造　　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本止觀門論頌一卷　世親菩薩造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本手杖論一卷　尊者釋迦稱造　大唐三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本六門教授習定論一卷　無著菩薩本　世親菩薩釋　大唐天后代三藏義淨譯新編入錄單本大乘法界無差別論一卷　堅慧菩薩造　大唐天后代于闐三藏提雲般若譯出大周錄單本破外道小乘四宗論一卷　提婆菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提流支譯單本破外道小乘涅槃論一卷　提婆菩薩造　元魏天竺三藏菩提留支譯單本上十七論十七卷同帙。

source_sentence: 右都計大乘經律論見流行者總八百八部二千九百八十八卷二百七十六帙。
translation: This is a total of eight hundred and eighty-eight sections, two thousand nine hundred and eighty-eight volumes, and two hundred and seventy-six books of Mahāyāna scriptures, rules, and treatises that have come into vogue.

source_sentence: 貞元新定釋教目錄卷第二十二
translation: Zhenyan Revised List of Canonical Buddhist Texts, Volume XXII
